title: Cyclist Magazine Podcast Episode 29 – Mat Hayman on Paris-Roubaix, life as a sports director and Aussie one-hit wonders
content:
Joe Robinson
29 Apr 2021

James and Joe are joined by the winner of surely the greatest race of the 21st century so far, Mat Hayman

On this week's instalment of the Cyclist Magazine Podcast, James and Joe are joined by 2016 Paris-Roubaix winner Mat Hayman.

The Aussie talks about making the switch from the peloton to the team car, the pressures Covid is putting on racing, his iconic Roubaix win five years ago, living in Belgium and Australian one-hit wonder Daryl Braithwaite.

If you liked this episode, please remember to leave us a review, comment and make sure to share with your cycling friends!
